name: Australia & New Zealand Bowhunting Simulator
description:
Hunt wild animals with bow & arrow in Australia & New Zealand hunting simulator.

Return to wilderness and prepare for the ultimate animals hunting challenge with Australia & New Zealand Archery FPS Hunting Simulator. World’s greatest hunting experience while getting new trophies, taking down kangaroo, dingo and emu. Shoot like a pro, develop a steady hand and master your skills to take the perfect shot. Hunt or be hunted! Get them before they get you! If you got bored with “sniper zombie WW2” games and need some more sophisticated wild hunting entertainment - download Australia & New Zealand FPS Hunting Simulator! Kill furious beasts like crocodile, kangaroo or emu :) without a sniper rifle or crossbow (only bow!). This game will get you to the very best wild hunting grounds in Australia & New Zealand (Togariro National Park, Abel Tasman National Park, Kahurangi, Mount Aspiring & Arthur’s Pass National Park for NZ and Kakadu, Uluru-Kata Tjuta, Litchfield, Kalbarri, Wilsons Promontory, Lamington and Purnululu national parks). It’s absolutely free, gives you plenty of fun and relax while shooting bow and hunting wild animals! Animals treat jungle/forest as their sanctuary, if you enter it, they will treat you as an invader. While hunting be aware that animals will startle or attack you when they hear shoot or any disturbing noise! Master your bow technique, become the master archer. Be a hunter! Precision and reflex is required. This FPS simulator gives you opportunity to experience the best wild animals hunting! Bow shooting gives you ultimate experience of an archer, brings you the whole new way of having fun with shooting and hunting in wild australian and New Zealand hunting grounds. Tap the screen to stretch the bow and shoot. This multi mode addictive game will help you increase concentration and patience. Bazooka, crossbow or machine gun are for noobs - only bow gives you the ultimate hunter experience. Enjoy the plenty of levels, beautiful wild 3d australian environment, real life animals you can hunt only in australia and new zealand, wind factor and the most realistic bowhunting experience games ever offered. Hunt with bow like never before. Compete real-time users on the leaderboard! Become the archery master! Hold your breath, aim the target and shoot the arrow. Hunt in different environments: Jungle animals hunting, desert, islands etc! No military sniper training needed, no shooting skills required - any amateur can now experience wild animals hunting in front of his mobile device.
Animals are so real they nearly jump off your screen! Pursue trophies in unique locations of Australia and New Zealand, go to a hunting expedition! Take down predators before they get you! Travel across Australia (from Sydney to Canberra - from Brisbane to Melbourne) and enjoy the High-end, immersive tablet and mobile gameplay! Embark the animals hunting expedition! It’s open season - join the hunt now! No training needed. Simply release the string of the bow. Feel the Inescapable addiction, enjoy the realistic shooting experience. Simple controls, moving targets, wind factor will make you addicted

Australia and New Zealand FPS Bowhunting Simulator gives you:
Beautiful environment in 3D
Realistic archery & bowhunting experience
Stunning 3D graphics
Plenty of different levels
Real life animals
High score
Different arrows and bows

You can play offline - no internet (wifi) is needed
Play hunting games free!

Enjoy our other games like hunting in African Savannah or Wild grounds of Russia! Try our crossbow game - (Crossbow Hunter & Crossbow Champion)
